item.title: Betafpv Vr02
item.description: $65.99 Amazon Includes battery Weight: 300g Screen resolution: 800*480 px Screen size: 4.3 inch View Angle: 55° Built-in 5.8G 14DBI high-quality antennas

item.title: Skyzone SKY04L V2
item.description: Receiver: 5.8Ghz 48CH Steadyview Receiver Screen: LCOS Resolution: 1280X960 Aspect Ratio: 4:3/16:9 FOV (Diagonal): 39° DVR: H264, 60fps, SD Card support up to128Gb $362.99 getfpv

item.title: iFlight Nazgul5 V2 4S
item.description: Banggood Features 5mm arm design for more durability XING-E 2207 motors and NAZGUL 5140 props Fits both 30.5x and 20x stacks Specifications FC: SucceX-E F7 45A flight stack ESC: SucceX-E 45A 2-6S BLHeli_S 4-in-1 ESC VTX: SucceX Force 5.8g 800mW VTX Adjustable XING-E 2207 FPV Motor（4S 2750KV) Wheelbase: 240mm*240mm Body size: 170*170mm Propeller size: 5 inch /5.1 inch FC pattern: 30.530.5/2020 mm FPV cam spacing: 19mm Weight: 393.

item.title: Tattu Funfly 1550mah 4s Lipo
item.description: getfpv Minimum Capacity: 1550mAh Configuration: 4S1P / 14.8V / 4 Cells Discharge Rate: 100C Max Burst Discharge Rate: 200C Net Weight(±20g): 178g/unit Dimensions: 72mm Length x 35mm Width x 36mm Height Charge Plug: JST-XHR Discharge Plug: XT-60

item.title: About
item.description: This is my personal website. You’ll find here what I care to document and share. It’s also my playground to test web technologies. My social links: LinkedIn YouTube Instagram GitHub
